reviews.review: dark. light. funny. serious. inane. thought provoking. waiting on the next

Loved it! Saw it on the release date in theaters. Cried TWICE! It was really well done and amazing. Probably one of the best Marvel Movies ever to be created! Loved the action and the fighting scenes. There are a lot. So many heroes in one place! If you haven't seen it, then get off of your couch and go to your nearest theater. You will want to see it. And also, stay after the end credits. You won't want to miss it,
best comic movie ever this is the Empire strikes back of the MCU
Loved it canâ€™t wait until the next one.

I don't ever cry at movies, yet Avengers: Infinity War was enough to make me cry like a fucking baby. Which I guess means it was pretty good, but I'm removing a star out of spite. Fuck you, Tom Holland, and your little mind games.
Esta bien buena la pelicula y punto.
Well done. Nice build up over the last 10 years to this movie

It's difficult to say which I like more this film or The latest Thor film but I must say I absolutely loved this movie. Thanos was a well developed and acted villain. Every role was excecuted brilliantly. The plot was well written and left a profound impact on me. Would definitely watch again and can't wait for the next one!!

Avengers: Infinity War is the best installment in the MCU thus far. The different story lines throughout the film are (for the most part) neatly tied together. Thanos is a tremendous character, but his intent is sometimes confusing. The movie also fails at times to accurately portray how powerful Thanos is really supposed to be. 

Overall, this is a great film with a high level of re-watchability. 4.5/5 Stars

The directors did a wonderful job balancing the multiple amounts of superheroes in the movie, but it doesn;t have the same spark as the the first Avengers movie, which, contrary to popular belief, is better than Avengers: Infinity War. But still, this movie is a great movie, as it balances emotion and humour very well, and I definitely will watch this movie again . I encourage everyone to not only watch this movie, but to watch the movies that come before and after it. Marvel is awesome!
